---
title: "Displaying densities"
runtime: shiny
output: html_document
---

```{r include=FALSE}
library(NHANES)
library(ggformula)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
A <- selectInput("response", "Response variable",
                 choices = c("Weight", "Height", "Poverty", "Pulse", 
                             "BMI", "TotChol", "BPSys1", "UrineVol1", 
                             "Testosterone", "Age"), 
                 width = "100px")
Facet <- selectInput("facet", "Explanatory var.", choices = c("None", "Gender", "HomeOwn", "SmokeNow", "SexEver", "PregnantNow", "Depressed", "Work", "PhysActive", "AgeDecade" ), width = "100px")
C <- checkboxGroupInput("layers", "Graphics layers:",
                        c("density", "histogram"), width = "100px")
S <- sliderInput("bw", "Smoothing:", min = 1, max = 20, value = 3, width = "150px")
P <- plotOutput("plot1", width = "500px",
                brush = brushOpts("eliminate", direction = "x", fill = NA))
```




```{r echo = FALSE, context = "server"}
the_formula <- reactive({
  basic <- paste("yval ~", input$response)
  if (input$facet != "None" ) basic <- paste(basic, "|", input$facet)
  as.formula(basic)
  })
the_formula2 <- reactive({
  basic <- paste("~", input$response)
  if (input$facet != "None" ) basic <- paste(basic, "|", input$facet)
  as.formula(basic)
})

the_data <- reactive({
  res <- NHANES
  res$yval = 1.1 * max_y_value() 
  res$keepers <- TRUE

  res
})

observe({
  req(input$response)
  M <- diff(range(the_data()[[input$response]], na.rm = TRUE))
  M <- 10^floor(log10(M))
  
  updateSliderInput(session, "bw", max = M/5, min = M/250, value = M/20, step = M/250)
})

max_y_value <- reactive(switch(input$response, 
                             "Weight" = 0.018,
                             "Height" = 0.031,
                             "Testosterone" = 0.01,
                             "TotChol" = 0.12,
                             "Pulse"   = 0.35,
                             "BPSys1"  = 0.03,
                             "UrineVol1" = 0.01,
                             "BMI"     = 0.055,
                             "Age"     = 0.015,
                             "Poverty" = 0.5))
                      
max_x_value <- reactive(max(NHANES[[input$response]], na.rm = TRUE))

bw <- reactive(as.numeric(input$bw))

graphics <- reactive({
    set.seed(101) # so the dots don't move around
    all_data <- the_data()
    keepers <- all_data[all_data$keepers,]
    A <- gf_jitter(the_formula(), data = keepers, alpha = 0.1, 
                   height = 0.1 * max_y_value(),
                   size = bw() / 10)
    if ("density" %in% input$layers)
      A <- A %>% gf_density(the_formula2(), data = keepers, alpha = 0.5, 
                            color = "blue", fill = "blue",
                            bw = bw())
    if ("histogram" %in% input$layers)
      A <- A %>% gf_dhistogram(the_formula2(), data = keepers, 
                               alpha = 0.7, color = "black", fill = NA,
                               binwidth = bw() / 0.5)
    return(A %>% 
             gf_lims(y = c(0, 1.2*max_y_value()*
                               ifelse(length(input$layers)==0, 1, NA)), 
                     x = c(-.1,1) * max_x_value()) %>% 
             gf_labs(y = ifelse(length(input$layers)==0, "", "Density")))
  })


output$plot1 <- renderPlot({graphics()})
```
